mapper.select: select id, electricity_cabinet_id, core_sha256_value, sub_sha256_value, create_time, update_time from t_ota_file_ele_sha256 where id = #{id}
select id, electricity_cabinet_id, core_sha256_value, sub_sha256_value, create_time, update_time from t_ota_file_ele_sha256 limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_ota_file_ele_sha256(electricity_cabinet_id, core_sha256_value, sub_sha256_value, create_time, update_time) values (#{electricityCabinetId}, #{coreSha256Value}, #{subSha256Value}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update t_ota_file_ele_sha256
electricity_cabinet_id = #{electricityCabinetId},
core_sha256_value = #{coreSha256Value},
sub_sha256_value = #{subSha256Value},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, electricity_cabinet_id, core_sha256_value, sub_sha256_value, create_time, update_time from t_ota_file_ele_sha256 where electricity_cabinet_id = #{eid}
